mapper.insert: insert into manager(manager_id, approval_target) select distinct case authority_code when 'A1' then (select user_id from temp_user as u1 where authority_code = 'A2' and u1.dept_id = t.dept_id) when 'A2' then (select distinct user_id from temp_user as u2 join dept on u2.dept_id = dept.upper_dept_id where authority_code = 'A2' and dept.dept_id = d.dept_id) end as 'manager_id', user_id from temp_user as t inner join dept as d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id where t.authority_code !='A3' and t.user_id = #{userId}
